title: Websocket client not working anymore
body:
### Describe the bug

Connecting to websocket servers with Quarkus websocket client does not work since 2.4.0.Final and the update to Quarkus HTTP 4.1.3. 
Connecting also does not work in Quarkus version 2.6.3.Final.
With 2.3.1.Final and 2.3.0.Final a connection is still possible.

